name: Doubtstep
description:
Warning: the videos are somehow huge (don't waste your mobile data here, please!) and it takes a while to load them correctly.
It's better if you download the game to play it offline.

This was made during late nights at the GGJ16 in Rome, as a side project.
At the time I uploaded the wrong version, the one without reading improvements. This one.
There is still some work to be done here, like getting rid of those huge videos and reimplement the long lost reading improvements :)
